file_insights.description: Root loading component for dashboard with skeleton placeholders
key_components: Skeleton function for generating loading placeholders
ProjectCardSkeleton for project grid loading state

file_insights.description: Project detail loading component with skeleton UI
key_components: Project metadata and git information skeleton cards

patterns_discovered: Next.js App Router Suspense loading pattern
Accessibility-focused loading UI with screen reader text
gotchas_discovered: Need to manually create detailed skeleton components
Ensuring loading UI matches actual page layout
Handling responsive design in loading states
recommendations: Reuse Skeleton component across different loading states
Maintain consistent design language between actual content and loading placeholders
Add aria attributes for improved accessibility
Consider dynamic skeleton count based on actual data layout
